thread.title: BRIEF-Top Spring International ‍Sees FY Consol Net Profit To Increase

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Top Spring International ‍Sees FY Consol Net Profit To Increase

organizations.name: reuters) - top spring international holdings ltd

text:
Jan 24 (Reuters) - Top Spring International Holdings Ltd :
* ‍EXPECTED TO RECORD A SIGNIFICANT INCREASE IN CONSOLIDATED NET PROFIT FOR YEAR ENDED 31 DECEMBER 2017​
* EXPECTED RESULT DUE TO GAIN ON DISPOSAL OF CERTAIN UNITS ENGAGED IN PROPERTY DEVELOPMENT AND OTHERS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
